main event: A sighting of a spherical silver gray object approximately 3/250 mile in size off the coast of Santa Monica, California.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and occurred at 1:00 PM on November 6, 1957,The object exhibited a bizarre disappearance,It is suggested that the sighting was possibly a reflection from an aircraft,The report includes multiple commentaries about the nature of the observation,Despite the peculiar description, the report concluded it was likely a natural occurrence.
